2019-2020 SEASON

So far, the FY 19-20 season was our most successful season. During our best qualifier, the San Mateo Qualifying Tournament we won the top two awards, the Inspire award and the Captain Winning Alliance award! We ranked first place since we were undefeated throughout our entire robot game, leading us to earn the Winning Alliance award and qualify for the NorCal FTC regional tournament. We earned the Inspire Award by being the team that best incorporates the challenge of the FIRST Tech Challenge program and for being a role model FIRST team. We also were runner-ups for the Control and Connect awards and were truly honored to win all of these awards. It felt good to see our hard work pay off! Overall, we are happy that our team has improved so much over time, and we are extremely motivated to keep up our hard work!
